#summary QuickStart for using aBatis

-simple & light ORM library
-開発期間短縮・工程分担可能 

--shorten a development period
--independent of development phase

 -webのibatisより使い易い
--easy-to-use as ibatis

 -ibatisの特徴を継承 
--carrying ibatis's feature


 -sdk1.6から使える


<h2>aBatis is a data mapper framework available for Android that couples objects with stored procedures or SQL statements using an XML descriptor or annotations.</h2><p>
<h2>aBatis is free software that is distributed under the Apache License 2.0.</h2><p>
<h2>aBatis is like an Android equivalent of iBatis.</h2><p>
<h2>aBatis supports Android 1.6 and up.</h2><p>
